name: wraparound
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(UK also wrapround) (a piece of clothing that is) made so that it can be tied around the body: a wraparound skirt
(used to describe) something that curves around in one continuous piece

Add to word list
Add to word list
(of clothing) made so that it can be tied around the body: She wore a blue wraparound skirt.
Wraparound also means curving around in one continuous piece: wraparound sunglasses a wraparound windshield
